articles.author: Ian Livingston
articles.title: PM Update: More clouds fill our skies through a warmer Friday
articles.description: Today was chilly but we're back to milder weather starting tomorrow.
articles.content: Temperatures were a bit below normal today, which certainly felt quite chilly despite plentiful sunshine. Most spots rose to right around 40, with high temperature normals running in the low 40s in and around the immediate area. After a seasonably cold one to… [+1284 chars]

articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: D.C. United adds 6-foot-9 goalkeeper in MLS draft as it nears high-profile signing
articles.description: The pick of prospect Simon Lefebvre came the same day Peruvian midfielder Edison Flores was in Washington for a physical and final paperwork involving a $5 million transfer to United.
articles.content:
Flores, 25, would help offset the loss of three key attackers, including captain Wayne Rooney.
The Peruvian national team starter arrived Wednesday with his agent and, according to people familiar with his itinerary, met team officials and toured the city.

articles.description: Congressional Democrats have floated various rationales over the past three weeks for not submitting the impeachment articles to the Senate.
articles.content:
But as Democratic pressure has grown for Pelosi to submit the impeachment articles, some Democrats have come to Pelosis defense, examples of which you can watch in the video above.

articles.author: Mehdi Fattahi and Aya Batrawy | AP
articles.title: On streets of Tehran, relief for now at no wider conflict
articles.description: Many Iranians say they are relieved that neither their country nor the United States appear primed right now for a more direct military confrontation
articles.content: But with the relief came some mixed feelings about how far Iran should go to avenge the killing of Revolutionary Guard Gen. Qassem Soleiman, the countrys most powerful commander who was slain by a U.S. drone strike in Baghdad last week. His death brought an o… [+5529 chars]

articles.author: Paul Waldman
articles.title: Want to help Red America? Increase the minimum wage.
articles.description: Democrats aren't advocating it for their own constituents, but for Republicans'.
articles.content:
And evidence is increasing that raising the wage has all kinds of benefits, including this striking new finding:
Raising the minimum wage may save lives. A study released this week suggests a correlation between an increase in the minimum wage and declining … [+4308 chars]
